Components.Concrete.Parser

Interface IParserCompExt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent, IParserComp
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDeterministicParserComp, ISLRParserComp
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSLRParserComp

    public interface IParserCompExt
extends IParserComp
    An extension of IParserComp interface with tree building and lookahead services.
    See Also:
    IParserComp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setParseTree(CECFGNode aParseTree)
      Sets the specified parse tree to this parser component.
      void setTreeBuilder(ITreeBuilderComp aTreeBuilder)
      Connects to the specified TreeBuilder component.
      void setTreeBuilding(boolean aValue)
      Sets the tree building mode of this Parser to the specified value.
      void setUseLookAhead(boolean aValue)
      Sets the lookahead mode of this Parser to the specified value.

      • Methods inherited from interface Components.Concrete.Parser.IParserComp

        getGrammar, getParser, getParserResult, getSymbolStream, setGrammar, setParser, setSymbolStream

      • Methods inherited from interface Components.IPAMOJAComponent

        addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

    • Method Detail

      • setTreeBuilder

        void setTreeBuilder(ITreeBuilderComp aTreeBuilder)
        Connects to the specified TreeBuilder component.
        Parameters:
        aTreeBuilder - the TreeBuilder to connect.

      • setTreeBuilding

        void setTreeBuilding(boolean aValue)
        Sets the tree building mode of this Parser to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        aValue - if tree building mode is allowed for this parser then true, else false.

      • setUseLookAhead

        void setUseLookAhead(boolean aValue)
        Sets the lookahead mode of this Parser to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        aValue - if lookahead mode is allowed for this parser then true, else false.

      • setParseTree

        void setParseTree(CECFGNode aParseTree)
        Sets the specified parse tree to this parser component.
        Parameters:
        aParseTree - the parse tree to set.
